articles.author: Tim Sullivan, Giovanna Dell'Orto
articles.title: Minneapolis mayor says ICE officer's killing of a motorist was 'reckless' and wasn't self-defense - AP News
articles.description: An Immigration and Customs Enforcement officer has shot and killed a Minneapolis driver during the Trump administration’s latest immigration crackdown on a major American city. Federal officials called the 37-year-old woman's killing Wednesday an act of self-…
articles.content: MINNEAPOLIS (AP) An Immigration and Customs Enforcement officer shot and killed a Minneapolis driver on Wednesday during the Trump administrations latest immigration crackdown on a major American cit… [+6153 chars]
